name: LYKE_Home_Daryl_Cream_Recliner
reviews: This recliner is beautiful. Plush, cushy, and very comfortable. I love it. The cream color is perfect, and the chair is well made. Exactly what I wanted. Very attractive addition to my room.
description: If you're looking to experience plush comfortable seating, it is exactly what will happen with this cream bonded leather recliner by LYKE Home. Featuring padded arms, extra plush backs with easy reclining creates the ultimate relaxation.Pattern: SolidType: ReclinersMaterial: LeatherStyle: ContemporaryColor: BeigeDimensions: 40 inches long x 37 inches wide x 38 inches highStyleContemporaryMaterialLeatherChair TypeReclinersAssemblyAssembledColorBeigeFurniture PatternSolid
